content: the labyrinth has it s perfect and endless pathways in it s maze - and the labyrinth granny square will hopefully have the same amazing affect as you create your own pattern finished size 8 x 8 yarn #4 worsted weight sample used yarn bee soft & sleek in pumpkin mustard & kale crochet hook size i/9 5 5 mm skill level this is a beginner level pattern with easy to follow instructions you will need to be familiar with basic crochet stitches all patterns are in english and written in standard us terms
